name: Erratic Eating
description:
In this game you play as the zombie!

You have successfully obliterated all life at the farm.  You have left-over meat to feed for days. The problem is that you don't remember where you left it. 

Use your terrific sense of smell to locate the piles of meat you have left behind. But you might want to hurry, as if you get too hungry, you start to eat yourself!

Controls: 

Hold down right mouse button to use your smell sense.

Move using the WASD or the arrowkeys.

Eat by pressing E or SPACE.

Credits:

Coder - Rishi Krishnan Sherly

Artist - Gabriel Ansgariusson
